description: Contains Home Health verbal orders noadd single items information.

columns.name: VERBAL_ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the verbal order record.

columns.name: ORDER_DATE
columns.description: Local date for home care order. Since this a local date, it will not always match the date in ORDER_INSTANT_UTC_DTTM.

columns.name: PROVIDER_ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the provider who is the referring provider for the verbal order. Links to table REFERRAL_SOURCE. The unique ID associated with the provider record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the REFERRAL_SOURCE table.

columns.name: PROVIDER_ID_REFERRING_PROV_NAM
columns.description: The name of the referral source.

columns.name: USER_RECEIVED_ID
columns.description: User ID of the verbal order receiving user.  Links to table CLARITY_EMP.

columns.name: CREATE_DATE
columns.description: Date on which the verbal order was created.

columns.name: PATIENT_ID
columns.description: Patient ID of the patient for whom the verbal order is created.  Links to table PATIENT.

columns.name: STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Verbal order status. Includes: not submitted, submitted, signed, sent, responded. Links to category table ZC_LVO_STATUS.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Not Submitted


Submitted


Signed


Sent


Responded


Entered


Resubmitted


Waiting for Review


Retracted


Canceled

columns.name: POC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number of the patient associated with the hospice plan of care that generated the order.

columns.name: PLAN_OF_CARE_ID
columns.description: This item contains the hospice plan of care ID associated with this verbal order.

columns.name: COSIGN_PROVIDER_ID
columns.description: This item stores the cosign provider.

columns.name: COSIGN_PROVIDER_ID_REFERRING_PROV_NAM
columns.description: The name of the referral source.

columns.name: IS_COSIGN
columns.description: This item contains whether the verbal order has been cosigned.

columns.name: ORDER_MODE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item indicates how the order was communicated. This helps distinguish between orders sent in by the physician unsolicited, orders communicated verbally from the physician to the clinician, and orders sent to the physician by the clinician without prior verbal communication. 


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Verbal


Physician Initiated


Clinician Initiated


Automatically Created

columns.name: AUTH_LAST_EVENT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The last event for the authorizing provider (in HH_VO_INFO.PROVIDER_ID). Use this column when an order is sent to multiple providers and to differentiate between orders that are signed electronically and manually.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Submit


Received Signature


Sent


Replied With Changes


Printed


Faxed to Provider


Retract


Resent


Received Order


Admin Closed


Reviewed


Electronically Signed


Automatically Canceled


Waiting for Review


Failed Fax


POC Update Sent - No Signature Required

columns.name: PHY_CERT_CHARGE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the physician certification or recertification charge.

columns.name: AUTO_CREATION_SRC_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores how the home care order was automatically created.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Created at sync


Created when HH POC was sent


Created by utility

columns.name: ORDER_INSTANT_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: UTC date and time at which a home care order was placed. For orders created before we captured order time explicitly, the time saved here is equivalent to midnight local time.

columns.name: FACE_TO_FACE_ENC_DATE
columns.description: This item stores the encounter date for Face to Face orders.  It is not used for other order types.

columns.name: CODE_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Document the type of code status this order placed (Full Code, DNR, etc.).


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


<Disabled>


Full Code


DNR


Partial Code

columns.name: PLAN_OF_CARE_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number of the hospice plan of care that generated the order. This is used to identify the version of the plan that was sent with the order.

columns.name: RECORD_STATUS_2_C_NAME
columns.description:
Record status flag. Used in conjunction with record archived flag for encounter archiving.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Soft Deleted


Hidden


Hidden and Soft Deleted
